         I. Graduation Project
               Title             : Courier Management System

               Description : These project is based on overall management
in the center of courier. Where as the courier company do all
things mandatory. Due this cocnept it's taking lot of time. For
those reason, we develop one system which can used in courier
office. It's reduce the paper work and Mandatory.
II. Post-Graduation Project

Description : These project is based on Leave of any company,
Where as employee can take leave using this system. All details
about the employee leave is mention in this system. All level of
management can use easily to taking a leave.
